# Display R code

```{r}
#| label: datasets
# logical
c(TRUE, FALSE)
# integer
0:1
# numeric
c(0.0, 1.1)
# scientific
c(1e-10, 1e10)
# character
c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday")
# factor
factor(c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday"))
# function
my_fun <- function(x){
  cat("my function is", x)
}
# data.frame
state <- data.frame(
  region = state.region,
  Division = state.division,
  state.x77
)
# function
my_fun("cool")
# boodschappen
message("this is a message")
warning("this is a warning")
stop("this is an error message")
# programma flow
if (is.data.frame(state)) {
  summary(state)
} else {
  stop("state is not a data.frame")
}
for (i in 1:5) {
  cat("i =", i, "\n")
}
```
